Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Richland Winery.
Room.LongDescription: The Chateau Richland Winery is located to the north and the Chateau Richland Grape Orchard is located to the south. This convinience lowers the cost of transportation and other nasty overheads to provide their customers with the finest wines at the lowest cost. The Richland Winery produces one of the best Bordeaux wines in the land.
